20 #ifndef __ROGUE_QUEUE_H__
21 #define __ROGUE_QUEUE_H__
22 #include <condition_variable>
23 #include <stdint.h>
24 #include <queue>
25 #include <mutex>
26 
27 namespace rogue {
28  template<typename T>
29  class Queue {
30  private:
31  std::queue<T> queue_;
32  mutable std::mutex mtx_;
33  std::condition_variable pushCond_;
34  std::condition_variable popCond_;
35  uint32_t max_;
36  uint32_t thold_;
37  bool busy_;
38  bool run_;
39  public:
40 
41  Queue() {
42  max_ = 0;
43  thold_ = 0;
44  busy_ = false;
45  run_ = true;
46  }
47 
48  void stop() {
49  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mtx_);
50  run_ = false;
51  pushCond_.notify_all();
52  popCond_.notify_all();
53  }
54 
55  void setMax(uint32_t max) { max_ = max; }
56 
57  void setThold(uint32_t thold) { thold_ = thold; }
58 
59  void push(T const &data) {
60  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mtx_);
61 
62  while(run_ && max_ > 0 && queue_.size() >= max_)
63  pushCond_.wait(lock);
64 
65  if ( run_ ) queue_.push(data);
66  busy_ = ( thold_ > 0 && queue_.size() >= thold_ );
67  popCond_.notify_all();
68  }
69 
70  bool empty() {
71  return queue_.empty();
72  }
73 
74  uint32_t size() {
75  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mtx_);
76  return queue_.size();
77  }
78 
79  bool busy() {
80  return busy_;
81  }
82 
83  void reset() {
84  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mtx_);
85  while(!queue_.empty()) queue_.pop();
86  busy_ = false;
87  pushCond_.notify_all();
88  }
89 
90  T pop() {
91  T ret;
92  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mtx_);
93  while(run_ && queue_.empty()) popCond_.wait(lock);
94  if ( run_ ) {
95  ret=queue_.front();
96  queue_.pop();
97  }
98  busy_ = ( thold_ > 0 && queue_.size() >= thold_ );
99  pushCond_.notify_all();
100  return(ret);
101  }
102  };
103 }

105 #endif
